mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEETING_TBL WHERE MEETING_DAY > SYSTIMESTAMP ORDER BY MEETING_DAY ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LINEUP_TBL WHERE MEETING_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT U.USER_NAME, S.USER_NO, S.PROFILE_FILERENAME, S.PROFILE_INTRODUCE FROM SNS_TBL S JOIN MEETING_TBL M ON S.USER_NO = M.READER_NO JOIN USER_TBL U ON S.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE M.MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo} AND S.USER_NO = #{readerNo}

SELECT U.USER_NAME, S.USER_NO, S.PROFILE_FILERENAME, S.PROFILE_INTRODUCE FROM SNS_TBL S JOIN MEETING_TBL M ON S.USER_NO = M.READER_NO JOIN USER_TBL U ON S.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE M.MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo} AND S.USER_NO = #{readerNo}

SELECT U.USER_NAME, S.USER_NO, S.PROFILE_FILERENAME, S.PROFILE_INTRODUCE FROM SNS_TBL S JOIN LINEUP_TBL L ON S.USER_NO = L.USER_NO JOIN USER_TBL U ON S.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE L.MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo}
SELECT * FROM MEETING_TBL M JOIN LINEUP_TBL L ON M.MEETING_NO = L.MEETING_NO WHERE L.USER_NO = #{userNo} OR M.READER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY MEETING_DAY DESC
